The GCD Project Explorer helps you navigate your project. The GCD Project Explorer is also the primary means by which you add data to your project, perform analyses, integrate settings, and access past results. Another very convenient feature of the project explorer is it allows you to Add to Map the map-based inputs and outputs that are part of your project to your map (*.mxd) table of contents in ArcGIS.

The GCD project explorer is also accessible from the 1. Project Menu or from the GCD Project Explorer button:

found on the GCD toolbar:

There are an overwhelming number of commands and context menus available from the project explorer listed below. Most are very intuitive and easy to use and require little explanation. All the same, each are spelt out with help pages and many have videos illustrating their use.

Commands & Features

  • A. Project Context Menu
    • i. Edit GCD Project Properties
    • ii. Add Entire Project to Map
    • iii. Explore GCD Project Folder
  • B. Inputs Context Menu
    • i. Add DEM Survey
    • ii. Add All DEM Surveys and AOIs to Map
  • C. DEM Surveys Context Menu
    • i. Add DEM Survey
    • ii. Add All DEM Surveys to Map
  • D. DEM Context Menu
    • i. Edit DEM Survey Properties
    • ii. Add to Map
    • iii. Delete DEM Survey
    • iv. Add Associated Surface
      • 1. Loading User Defined Associated Surface
      • 2. Deriving a Slope Analysis
      • 3. Deriving Point Density
      • 4. Deriving Roughness
  • E. Associated Surfaces Context Menu
    • i. Add Associated Surface
    • ii. Add All Associated Surfaces to Map
  • F. Individual Associated Surface Context Menu
    • i. Edit Associated Surface Properties
    • ii. Add Associated Surface to Map
    • iii. Delete Associated Surface
  • G. Error Surfaces Context Menu
    • i. Specify Error Surface
    • ii. Derive Error Surface
    • iii. Add All Error Surfaces to the Map
  • H. Individual Error Surface Context Menu
    • i. Edit Error Surface Properties
    • ii. Add Error Surfaces to Map
    • iii. Delete Error Surface
  • I. Areas of Interest Context Menu
    • i. Add AOI
    • ii. Add All AOIs to Map
  • J. Change Detection Context Menu
    • i. Add Change Detection
    • ii. Add All Change Detection Analyses to the Map
  • K. DoD Epoch Context Menu
    • i. Add Change Detection (With These Surveys)
    • ii. Add All Change Detections (With These DEM Surveys) to the Map
  • L. Individual Change Detection Context Menu
    • i. View Change Detection Results
    • ii. Add Change Detection to the Map
    • iii. Explore Change Detection Folder
    • iv. Delete Change Detection
    • v. Add Budget Segregation
  • M. Budget Segregation Folder Context Menu
  • N. Individual Budget Segregation Context Menu
    • i. View Budget Segregation Results
    • ii. Browse Budget Segregation
